title: Wangye’s Maid is the Sect Leader - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Beautiful Female Lead   Childcare   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Pregnancy   Royalty
author: Yiyu Huakai   一語花開
description: In order to steal the Zhan Lu Sword, she sneaked into the Xiao Prince’s Mansion as a servant. But who knew that she would get eaten thoroughly (AKA Get knocked up/sexy time). Six years later, her son unwilling to be lonely, left home to seek shelter with his father. And with the purpose of bringing her son back home, she had no other choice than to once again enter the Xiao Prince Mansion. Yet, who knew that she would be plotted against by her two-faced son and his father. It really was a hatred that’d last for all eternity.>
